title: 93/346/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 May 1993 amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 May 1993 amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(93/346/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/473/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 May 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 279, 30. 9. 1986, p. 53.
(4) OJ No L 39, 15. 2. 1992, p. 42.
ANNEX
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS
